Protagonist of the history that we will control during the adventure. It is a young warrior who has been sleeping for 100 years until one day he is awakened by a strange female voice, beginning the journey to know his past, as well as to save Hyrule from the threat of Ganon.
Princess of the Kingdom of Hyrule who is very close to Link. Throughout the rebellion suffered by the attack of Ganon we see that it is one of those that more strives to save the Kingdom.
Villain of history who has flooded the Kingdom with evil for the last 100 years. His simple presence already endangers the whole kingdom
Brave Goron who controls the divine beast Vah Rudania.
Orni heard and trusted who controls the divine beast Vah Medoh.
Princess of the Zora who controls Vah Ruta.
Member of the Gerudo tribe, who controls the divine beast Vah Naboris.
Make responsible use of this chat

The olinguito is distinct from the other species within the genus, popularly known as "olingos", and also from the kinkajou (kinkajous resemble olingos, but are not closely related). Its average weight is 900 grams (2 lb), making it the smallest procyonid. The animal is an omnivorous frugivore that eats mainly fruits (such as figs), but also insects and nectar; this diet results in feces the size of small blueberries.
